PlayerFootEffect_bySFX.Wiki: This is the identifier used for the SFXID of the foot effect. It corresponds to ZZZ of XYYZZZ.

SnipeModeDrawAlpha_FadeTime.Wiki: Fade time to hide the player during precision shooting. The unit is seconds.

ToughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: This is the correction value used to calculate the player's poise recovery time.

DeceasedThreshold.Wiki: If you die while your death level is above this value, you will become a hollow.

GiantNutGetRand_MaxProbability.Wiki: Upper limit probability of drawing the fruit of the giant tree when invaded

AnimeID_DropItemPick.Wiki: Animation ID when picking up a dropped item

AnimeID_CofferItemPick.Wiki: Animation ID when picking up an item from a treasure chest (not used?)

LowStatus_AtkPowDown.Wiki: Insufficient status, Basic attack power reduction amount

GuardStatusCorrect_MaxStatusVal.Wiki: The maximum status value at which the performance increases, used when calculating the status correction value of the shield's performance.

WetOverrideInterpolateTime.Wiki: Material switching interpolation time when overlapped and wet

EstusFlaskAllocateRate.Wiki: Client bottle correction magnification during multiplayer

GiantNutGetRand_Base.Wiki: Basic probability of drawing the fruit of the giant tree when invaded

GiantNutGetRand_Bonus.Wiki: Giant fruit lottery bonus probability when invaded

KickAcceptanceDeg.Wiki: The angle at which the kick can be taken when viewed from the front of the player

NpcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Light.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players [%]. Light.

NpcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Normal.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players [%]. Normal.

NpcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Heavy.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players [%]. Heavy.

NpcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_WeightOver.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players [%]. Overweight.

NpcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_SuperLight.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players [%]. SuperLight.

GiantNutClientEffectId.Wiki: ID of the special effect applied to the dark spirit of the Giant Nut Seed

ClearCountCorrectBaseSpEffectId.Wiki: Standard ID of special effects applied for lap correction

ArrowBoltModelIdOffset.Wiki: Offset to add to model ID when displaying arrow and bolt models when equipped in slot 1. (Model Id + Offset value)

ArrowBoltRemainingNumModelMaskThreshold1.Wiki: 1-step threshold judgment value [%] when displaying an arrow or bolt model and applying a display mask based on the number of arrows. (If it is more than this value, it will be displayed in 1 step)

ArrowBoltRemainingNumModelMaskThreshold2.Wiki: Two-step threshold judgment value [%] when displaying arrow and bolt models and applying a display mask based on the number of arrows. (If it is more than this value, it will be displayed in two stages)

ResistRecoverPoint_Poision_Player.Wiki: How quickly the Poison status bar will drain on player characters

ResistRecoverPoint_Desease_Player.Wiki: How quickly the Terror status bar will drain on player characters

ResistRecoverPoint_Blood_Player.Wiki: How quickly the Burn status bar will drain on player characters

ResistRecoverPoint_Curse_Player.Wiki: How quickly the Enfeeble status bar will drain on player characters

ResistRecoverPoint_Freeze_Player.Wiki: How quickly the Shock status bar will drain on player characters

ResistRecoverPoint_Poision_Enemy.Wiki: How quickly the Poison status bar will drain on Npc's

ResistRecoverPoint_Desease_Enemy.Wiki: How quickly the Terror status bar will drain on Npc's

ResistRecoverPoint_Blood_Enemy.Wiki: How quickly the Burn status bar will drain on Npc's

ResistRecoverPoint_Curse_Enemy.Wiki: How quickly the Enfeeble status bar will drain on Npc's

ResistRecoverPoint_Freeze_Enemy.Wiki: How quickly the Shock status bar will drain on Npc's

DyingHp.Wiki: If the current HP is below this value, the player will be on the brink of death.

EstusFlaskAllocateRateForBattleRoyalDuel.Wiki: Correction multiplier for the number of client bottles held in multiplayer mode (Arena/Duel)

EstusFlaskAllocateOffsetForBattleRoyalDu.Wiki: Offset of the number of client bottles held in multiplayer mode (Arena/Duel)

EstusFlaskAllocateRateForBattleRoyalFree.Wiki: Correction multiplier for the number of client bottles in possession during multiplayer (Arena/Brawl)

EstusFlaskAllocateOffsetForBattleRoyalFr.Wiki: Offset of number of client bottles held in multiplayer (Arena/Brawl)

EstusFlaskAllocateRateForBattleRoyalTeam.Wiki: Correction multiplier for the number of client bottles in possession during multiplayer (Arena/Co-op)

EstusFlaskAllocateOffsetForBattleRoyalTe.Wiki: Offset of the number of client bottles held in multiplayer mode (Arena/Co-op)

MoneyLostRate.Wiki: Rate of money lost at death

SkillPointLostRate.Wiki: Skill experience value loss rate upon death

Self.Wiki: Misselaneous player params. Mostly DS3 leftovers
